byline.contributor: Louisa Reynolds and Tatiana Schlossberg contributed reporting.
byline.original: By SHARON OTTERMAN and MARC SANTORA

abstract: Funeral is held at St Patrick's Cathedral for Cardinal Edward M Egan, former archbishop of Roman Catholic Archdiocese of New York; Cardinal Timothy M Dolan keeps focus of mass on church, faith and ritual, as Egan would have wanted.
lead_paragraph: Cardinal Edward M. Egan, the ninth archbishop of the Roman Catholic Archdiocese of New York, was recalled in a ceremony at St. Patrick’s Cathedral.

headline.main: At Funeral for Cardinal Egan, Who Didn’t Want Spotlight, Focus Is on the Church
headline.print_headline: At Funeral for Egan, Who Didn’t Want Spotlight, the Focus Is on the Church

snippet: Cardinal Edward M. Egan, the ninth archbishop of the Roman Catholic Archdiocese of New York, was recalled in a ceremony at St. Patrick’s Cathedral.
